1.content: So which character are you going to start off with?
1.title: Starting off

13.content:
Well, who would pass this chance anyways. A curvy woman that wears orange wool apparel no matter were she is must be stenchy enought. But who are you?

Option 1: you are a warlock that can expand bodyparts. Your powers may or may not affecy wool clothing, but shoes will sure end destroyed if you expand a woman's feet
Option 2; you are a mew member of the mystery gang, you have a stink fetish for girls and you are not afraid to show it. The more slobbish the better
Option 3: you are a villain. Somehow you managed to deal with all the other members but Velma outwitted you and you are going to be tortured until you reveal the location of her friends... too bad you disbanded them and locations are far away from each other
Option 4: the gang disbanded, you are Velma's roomie but she has become unkept, two years without taking a bath or even changing clothes had give your loft a Velma's naturals odor. You tried to talk to her about this issue. But backfired and now she plans to torture you with her filthy clothes or her messy nude body
13.title: Velma

14.content: How do you meet our lovely lady
14.title: Daphne

141.content:
You ere watching tv when you heard a knock on the door when you answered you saw the lovely Daphne Blake at the door you invite her in and ask if she wants a drink she refuses

"I wanted to ask you about what you saw last night" she said sweetly

"I don't think your the person to talk to about this and I think it's time you were going"
You reply

"ok,but let me just gI've you something" she said reaching in her purse

next thing you know your looking down the barrel of a strange looking gun
Then there was a bright flash then nothing
141.title: I witnessed it

1411.content:
You were shrunk to size of an ant 🐜.

Daphne look at you with mischief in her eyes. “Well we could of done this the easy way, but boys will be boys.” The orange haired teen states as she was holding you.


You looked at her scared and trembling as you saw that she had absolute power over you. You could only muster up whatever words you could to know what she was planning.

“What do you intend on doing to me Daphne?” You has asked the giantess. Daphne could only smile . “ Well Velma has been trying so hard with Shaggy but he can’t notice her unless she was smelling like food or was food. So I plan on giving you to Velma .” She states as your face and body just dejected at the thought of it.


Daphne made her way to Velma place. “Hmm it seems like Velma not home yet but I have an idea 💡 ”. The orange haired girl took you out of her breast prison and was looking around Velma’s closet.
Daphne decided to put you in
1411.title: shrunk

14111.content: Daphne decided to put you inside a flask in velmas room but as she put you on the side, you leaped for freedom only to land in velmas spare set of shoe, which turn out to be velmas walking shoe. "well I was gonna put you in a beaker but here works just as well." she said as she turned the shoe upside down trapping you inside. As you sat in your dark prison you began to realise just how ____ it smelled
14111.title: Velma shoe

141112.content:
You couldn’t handle the smell it was like smell a smelly cheese factory you really couldn’t believe your luck at this point.



Just a you were in your thoughts you heard a loud booming sound. Even though you were trapped you still wonder who it was
141112.title: Smelly

1411121.content:
Just as you could press your luck any further you heard a female voice in the alter.


“Hmm where are my favorite shoes “ The giantess nerd asked herself as she was looking around her room after coming in.


Does Velma find the shoe that your stuck in
1411121.title: Velma
